06-04 Gradient boosting

Gradient boosting

Gradient boosting l√† m·ªôt ph∆∞∆°ng ph√°p s·ª≠ d·ª•ng gradient descent ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o ra c√°c c√¢y m·ªôt c√°ch tu·∫ßn t·ª±, ƒë·ªìng th·ªùi b√π ƒë·∫Øp cho c√°c l·ªói c·ªßa c√°c c√¢y tr∆∞·ªõc ƒë√≥ khi c·ªë g·∫Øng d·ª± ƒëo√°n k·∫øt qu·∫£ v·ªõi m·ªôt m√¥ h√¨nh ensemble bao g·ªìm nhi·ªÅu c√¢y. Gradient Boosting c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng cho c·∫£ h·ªìi quy v√† ph√¢n l·ªõp.

  • ƒê·ªÉ bi·∫øt th√™m th√¥ng tin chi ti·∫øt, tham kh·∫£o blog Gradient Boosting from scratch

[Tham kh·∫£o] Thu·∫≠t to√°n functional gradient descent

Gradient boosting ƒë∆∞·ª£c gi·ªõi thi·ªáu nh∆∞ m·ªôt thu·∫≠t to√°n functional gradient descent b·ªüi Llew Mason, Jonathan Baxter, Peter Bartlett v√† Marcus Frean. Thu·∫≠t to√°n functional gradient descent t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a h√†m m·∫•t m√°t tr√™n kh√¥ng gian h√†m b·∫±ng c√°ch li√™n t·ª•c l·ª±a ch·ªçn c√°c h√†m c√≥ h∆∞·ªõng √¢m c·ªßa gradient, do ƒë√≥ th·ª±c hi·ªán gradient descent.

[Tham kh·∫£o] Boosting vs Bagging

Boosting l√† m·ªôt k·ªπ thu·∫≠t ensemble t·∫°o ra c√°c weak learner m·ªôt c√°ch tu·∫ßn t·ª± ƒë·ªÉ d·ª± ƒëo√°n k·∫øt qu·∫£. Learner giai ƒëo·∫°n ti·∫øp theo h·ªçc t·ª´ d·ªØ li·ªáu m√† learner giai ƒëo·∫°n tr∆∞·ªõc ƒë√≥ ƒë√£ d·ª± ƒëo√°n sai, v√† k·∫øt qu·∫£ c·ªßa c√°c learner ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·∫°o ra tu·∫ßn t·ª± ƒë∆∞·ª£c k·∫øt h·ª£p ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o ra k·∫øt qu·∫£ cu·ªëi c√πng.

Bagging l√† m·ªôt k·ªπ thu·∫≠t ensemble t·∫°o ra c√°c weak learner ƒë·ªôc l·∫≠p v·ªõi nhau ƒë·ªÉ d·ª± ƒëo√°n k·∫øt qu·∫£. Do ƒë√≥, m·ªói learner ch·∫°y song song v√† k·∫øt qu·∫£ c·ªßa ch√∫ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c k·∫øt h·ª£p ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o ra k·∫øt qu·∫£ cu·ªëi c√πng.

  • ƒê·ªÉ bi·∫øt th√™m th√¥ng tin chi ti·∫øt, tham kh·∫£o blog What is the difference between Bagging and Boosting?

    Gradient Boosting

    H√£y xem x√©t n·ªÅn t·∫£ng v·ªÅ c√°ch Gradient Boosting ƒë∆∞·ª£c ph√°t tri·ªÉn.

Gi·∫£ s·ª≠ c√≥ m·ªôt m√¥ h√¨nh ensemble bao g·ªìm c√°c c√¢y ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng cho ph√¢n l·ªõp. M√¥ h√¨nh n√†y s·∫Ω mu·ªën d·ª± ƒëo√°n k·∫øt qu·∫£ sao cho t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a l·ªói v·ªõi c√°c gi√° tr·ªã quan s√°t ƒë∆∞·ª£c. G·ªçi c√°c gi√° tr·ªã quan s√°t ƒë∆∞·ª£c l√† \(y_i\), \(i=1,\dots,n\), d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë·∫ßu v√†o l√† \(x_i, i=1,\dots,n\), v√† c√°c gi√° tr·ªã d·ª± ƒëo√°n l√† \(u_i\), \(i=1,\dots,n\).

Nh∆∞ ƒë∆∞·ª£c hi·ªÉn th·ªã trong h√¨nh d∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y, m·ªói c√¢y thu·ªôc ensemble nh·∫≠n \(x_i \in R^p\) l√†m ƒë·∫ßu v√†o v√† ƒë∆∞a ra k·∫øt qu·∫£ theo c√°c ƒëi·ªÅu ki·ªán ph√¢n nh√°nh trong c√°c n√∫t c·ªßa c√¢y.

Gi√° tr·ªã d·ª± ƒëo√°n \(u_i\) c·ªßa m√¥ h√¨nh ensemble c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c t√≠nh to√°n b·∫±ng t·ªïng c√≥ tr·ªçng s·ªë c·ªßa k·∫øt qu·∫£ c·ªßa m·ªói c√¢y. (·ªû ƒë√¢y, \(T_j(x_i)\) l√† k·∫øt qu·∫£ ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë∆∞a ra b·ªüi c√¢y \(j\) khi n√≥ nh·∫≠n \(x_i\) l√†m ƒë·∫ßu v√†o.)

\[\begin{equation} u_i = \sum_{j=1}^M \beta_j T_j(x_i) \end{equation}\]

ƒê·ªëi v·ªõi h√†m m·∫•t m√°t, n√≥ c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a l√† \(L=(y_i,u_i)=(y_i - u_i)^2\) d∆∞·ªõi d·∫°ng t·ªïng b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng sai s·ªë ƒë·ªÉ t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a l·ªói gi·ªØa c√°c gi√° tr·ªã quan s√°t v√† d·ª± ƒëo√°n.

\[\begin{equation} \min_{\beta} \sum_{i=1}^n L\left(y_i, \sum_{j=1}^M \beta_j T_j(x_i)\right) \end{equation}\]

Th√¥ng th∆∞·ªùng, khi x√¢y d·ª±ng c√¢y trong c√°c m√¥ h√¨nh ensemble, nhi·ªÅu c√¢y nh·ªè v·ªõi ƒë·ªô s√¢u c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·∫°o ra. ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y l√† b·ªüi v√¨ vi·ªác l√†m cho c√¢y nh·ªè h∆°n s·ª≠ d·ª•ng √≠t b·ªô nh·ªõ h∆°n v√† cho ph√©p d·ª± ƒëo√°n nhanh h∆°n, v√† khi s·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng c√¢y tƒÉng l√™n, hi·ªáu su·∫•t c·ªßa ensemble c·∫£i thi·ªán. Th√¥ng th∆∞·ªùng, ƒë·ªô s√¢u c·ªßa c√¢y ƒë∆∞·ª£c c·ªë ƒë·ªãnh ·ªü m·ª©c 5 ho·∫∑c √≠t h∆°n.

Do ƒë√≥, trong b√†i to√°n n√†y, c√°c ƒëi·ªÅu ki·ªán n√∫t ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a trong m·ªói c√¢y r·∫•t ƒëa d·∫°ng v√† k·∫øt qu·∫£ c·ªßa r·∫•t nhi·ªÅu c√¢y ƒë∆∞·ª£c k·∫øt h·ª£p tuy·∫øn t√≠nh, l√†m cho kh√¥ng gian c√¢y kh√° l·ªõn. V√¨ v·∫≠y, c√≥ th·ªÉ n√≥i r·∫±ng ƒë√¢y l√† m·ªôt b√†i to√°n r·∫•t kh√≥ ƒë·ªÉ t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a.

ƒê·ªÉ gi·∫£i quy·∫øt v·∫•n ƒë·ªÅ n√†y, b√†i to√°n t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a ph·∫£i ƒë∆∞·ª£c chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi th√†nh m·ªôt b√†i to√°n d·ªÖ h∆°n. B√†i to√°n t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a ban ƒë·∫ßu l√† t√¨m \(M\) tr·ªçng s·ªë \(\beta_j\) ƒë·ªÉ t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a h√†m m·∫•t m√°t. H√£y nghƒ© v·ªÅ b√†i to√°n n√†y nh∆∞ m·ªôt b√†i to√°n t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a \(\min_{u} f(u)\) c·ªßa h√†m \(f(u)\) ƒë·ªëi v·ªõi c√°c gi√° tr·ªã d·ª± ƒëo√°n \(u\). N·∫øu h√†m \(f(u)\) l√† h√†m m·∫•t m√°t \(L(y,u)\), th√¨ vi·ªác t√¨m \(u\) ƒë·ªÉ t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a h√†m m·∫•t m√°t c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c coi l√† m·ªôt b√†i to√°n ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a l·∫°i m·ªôt c√°ch d·ªÖ d√†ng. (·ªû ƒë√¢y, \(n\) l√† s·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng ƒëi·ªÉm d·ªØ li·ªáu.)

Gradient boosting ƒë·ªÅ c·∫≠p ƒë·∫øn k·ªπ thu·∫≠t gi·∫£i quy·∫øt b√†i to√°n t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a l·∫°i \(\min_{u} f(u)\) s·ª≠ d·ª•ng gradient descent.

Thu·∫≠t to√°n

Thu·∫≠t to√°n Gradient boosting th·ª±c hi·ªán gradient descent theo c√°ch sau ƒë·ªÉ t√¨m ra nghi·ªám t·ªëi ∆∞u \(u^*\) c·ªßa \(\min_u L(y, u)\).

  1. ƒê·∫∑t gi√° tr·ªã ban ƒë·∫ßu l√† k·∫øt qu·∫£ c·ªßa m·ªôt c√¢y t√πy √Ω: \(u^{(0)}=T_0\). Sau ƒë√≥ l·∫∑p l·∫°i c√°c b∆∞·ªõc 2~4 sau ƒë√¢y.

  2. T√≠nh to√°n gradient √¢m cho \(u^{(k-1)}\), l√† gi√° tr·ªã d·ª± ƒëo√°n g·∫ßn nh·∫•t cho \(n\) ƒëi·ªÉm d·ªØ li·ªáu.
    \[\begin{equation} d_i = - \left . \left[ \frac{\partial L(y_i,u_i)}{\partial u_i} \right] \right|_{u_i = u_i^{(k-1)}}, i=1,\dots,n \end{equation}\]
  3. T√¨m c√¢y \(T_k\) c√≥ k·∫øt qu·∫£ \(T(x_i)\) gi·ªëng nh·∫•t v·ªõi c√°c gradient \(d_i\) cho \(n\) ƒëi·ªÉm d·ªØ li·ªáu.
    \[\begin{equation} \min_{\text{trees } T} \sum_{i=1}^n (d_i-T(x_i))^2 \end{equation}\]
  4. T√≠nh to√°n k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc b∆∞·ªõc \(a_k\) v√† c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t c√°c gi√° tr·ªã d·ª± ƒëo√°n s·ª≠ d·ª•ng \(T_k\) ƒë∆∞·ª£c t√¨m th·∫•y ·ªü tr√™n.
    \[u^{(k)}=u^{(k-1)} + \alpha_k T_k\]

Thu·∫≠t to√°n n√†y t√¨m gradient \(d\) ƒë·ªëi v·ªõi \(u\) ƒë·ªÉ t√¨m nghi·ªám t·ªëi ∆∞u \(u^*\) th√¥ng qua gradient descent, t√¨m \(T_k\) g·∫ßn nh·∫•t v·ªõi \(d\), v√† thay th·∫ø \(T_k\) thay v√¨ gradient trong ph∆∞∆°ng tr√¨nh c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t ƒë·ªÉ t√¨m v·ªã tr√≠ ti·∫øp theo.

Gi√° tr·ªã d·ª± ƒëo√°n cu·ªëi c√πng \(u^*\) thu ƒë∆∞·ª£c theo c√°ch n√†y c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c th·∫•y l√† gi·ªëng h·ªát v·ªõi t·ªïng c√≥ tr·ªçng s·ªë c·ªßa k·∫øt qu·∫£ c√¢y ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a tr∆∞·ªõc ƒë√≥. (T·ª©c l√†, n·∫øu ch√∫ng ta m·ªü r·ªông ph∆∞∆°ng tr√¨nh c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t ƒë·ªá quy \(u^{(k)}=u^{(k-1)} + \alpha_k T_k\) tr·ªü l·∫°i \(k=0\), ch√∫ng ta nh·∫≠n ƒë∆∞·ª£c \(u^* = \sum_{k=1}^n \alpha_k T_k\), c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c bi·∫øn th√†nh d·∫°ng t·ªïng c√≥ tr·ªçng s·ªë c·ªßa k·∫øt qu·∫£ c√¢y.)
